Posts.EditableText:
Well, I've been working on this for a good bit and it's finally to a point where I'm comfortable releasing it as a playable demo. This is a gamebook style game, so you read a passage and have a list of choices you can make to continue forward.

In this story, you must do everything to can to survive against a creature that shouldn't exist. Death is not the end, however, and victories can be short-lived. What will you do to survive?

https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/pp0pgeinlkal8accwvgy6q/nightmare
Posts.HTML:
Well, I've been working on this for a good bit and it's finally to a point where I'm comfortable releasing it as a playable demo. This is a gamebook style game, so you read a passage and have a list of choices you can make to continue forward.

In this story, you must do everything to can to survive against a creature that shouldn't exist. Death is not the end, however, and victories can be short-lived. What will you do to survive?

https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/pp0pgeinlkal8accwvgy6q/nightmare
